title: Scalar projection
summary: In mathematics, the scalar projection of a vector a {\displaystyle \mathbf {a} } on (or onto) a vector b , {\displaystyle \mathbf {b} ,} also known as the scalar resolute of a {\displaystyle \mathbf {a} } in the direction of b , {\displaystyle \mathbf {b} ,} is given by:
